steps.title: He prefers to use subtle body language when flirting.
steps.content: He prefers to use subtle body language when flirting. Eye contact allows him to share an intimate moment with you without being too forward or suggestive. He may even avoid your eyes at first but work up to more eye contact as he gains confidence. Holding your gaze is a sign that he wants to be more open with you! Make sure you're not starting a staring match and focus on following his queues. If he starts holding eye contact more often, you can do the same.

steps.title: Virgos appreciate sophisticated clothes and a well-groomed appearance.
steps.content: Virgos appreciate sophisticated clothes and a well-groomed appearance. Focus on looking neat and wearing simple but fitted clothing that flatters your figure. Virgo men don't look for the flashiest or most revealing person in the room; they look for someone with a refined personal style and an air of sophistication about them. [2] X Research source As earth signs, Virgos appreciate soft earthy tones. Wear lots of creams, browns, and blacks, with pops of green or orange if you want some color. You can also wear quality fabrics to impress him, like silk and suede. Be detail-oriented and pay attention to your hair, nails, and accessories. Make sure everything matches and looks tidy.

steps.title: Encourage Virgo's natural curiosity and let him get to know you slowly.
steps.content: Encourage Virgo's natural curiosity and let him get to know you slowly. Answer questions about yourself when he asks, but try to be a little vague at first. Rather than giving him the whole story, offer a few details and hint that there's more to tell. Always save a couple of stories for the next time you see him, so he keeps trying to learn more about you. "I love exploring new places! I got to do a lot of traveling as a kid." "I went to a great college in New York! Got some funny stories to tell from those days, too. What about you?"

steps.title: Give your self-critical Virgo a confidence boost by flattering him.
steps.content: Give your self-critical Virgo a confidence boost by flattering him. He's a perfectionist, which means he does many things really well but criticizes himself nonetheless. Recognize his best qualities and make him feel good about the work he does. Be honest and sincere with every compliment! [3] X Research source "Your perspective is so refreshing! I always have something new to think about when we talk." "I'm so glad I met a fellow foodie! You have great taste in restaurants."

steps.title: Practical Virgos love to feel useful to people they like.
steps.content: Practical Virgos love to feel useful to people they like. steps.title: He loves intelligent conversation and wants a partner who can match him.
steps.content: He loves intelligent conversation and wants a partner who can match him. Get him talking about one of his interests; this could range from a philosophical debate to analyzing his favorite movie. Listen, give him your honest opinion, and don't be afraid to disagree. So long as you're respectful, he'll love to have his brain challenged and be interested to hear new perspectives. "Have you heard this podcast yet? I think it offers some really fascinating perspectives on old true crime stories. I'd love to know what you think!" "I've read a few new books lately that I really enjoyed. What about you? I'm sure you have great taste in books."

steps.title: Dry, witty humor is common among Virgo guys.
steps.content: Dry, witty humor is common among Virgo guys. Appeal to that sense of humor by engaging him in playful banter and offering up dry or sarcastic remarks that will amuse him. Virgos have understated humor, but as you get to know him, he'll start to come out of his shell and tell more jokes around you too. "Of course I talk to myselfâ€”sometimes I need some expert advice." "I went to a restaurant that serves 'breakfast at any time.' So I was really confused when they said I couldn't have French toast during the Renaissance." Send a deadpan text and then follow it up with a goofy GIF, so he knows you're joking. Crude humor isn't really a Virgo's cup of tea. Keep your jokes clean and witty for the best effect!

steps.title: Acknowledge your Virgo's driven and hardworking nature.
steps.content: Acknowledge your Virgo's driven and hardworking nature. He's proud of the work he does and probably has some lofty ambitions, whether it's professional or about one of his hobbies. Wish him a good day at work, and ask him about his day when he gets home. If he needs help to meet his goals, offer to be that source of support. "Good luck at work today! You worked really hard, and your presentation is going to be amazing." "Hey, handsome! How was your day today? You've really been going above and beyond lately at work."

steps.title: An optimist can balance Virgo's tendency to be hard on himself.
steps.content: An optimist can balance Virgo's tendency to be hard on himself. Convince him to relax and enjoy himself a little after a hard day's work, and offer encouraging words when he gets too critical of himself. When he makes a big accomplishment, celebrate with him and be his cheerleader. Virgos are extremely attracted to people who can be a source of positivity in their lives. steps.title: These guys are conservative when it comes to romance.
steps.content: These guys are conservative when it comes to romance. Be sweet, subtle, and sincere when you start flirting with him. [6] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. He'll enjoy dignified flirtation to overtly sexual comments, at least in the beginning. For Virgo, there's a time and a place to get explicit; he might be interested in steamy exchanges when your relationship progresses a little more. "Hey! You're looking handsome today." "You know, you're pretty amazing. I'm glad we met!" "I feel comfortable being myself when we're together. I hope you do too!"

steps.title: Virgos are attracted to people with self-assured attitudes.
steps.content: Virgos are attracted to people with self-assured attitudes. Let your confidence shine when you talk to him about your ambitions and goals in life. Show him that you're as driven and hardworking as he is. Talking about your accomplishments is a great way to make you feel more confident about yourself, too! "It's so refreshing to talk to someone as goal-oriented as I am!" "I've been making some great progress at work lately. Can we talk about it?"

steps.title: This sign can't be rushed into anything, especially romance.
steps.content: This sign can't be rushed into anything, especially romance. Being flirty with a Virgo requires a balancing act between showing your interest without scaring him off by getting too intense. He'll appreciate you taking the initiative, but then he'll need space to decide how he feels and flirts back on his own terms. If you start the flirting, for example, let him be the one to take the next step and ask you out. That way, you're letting him know that you're interested without pushing him for more. When you're texting, wait for his response before sending a follow-up message. Double-texting could make him feel pressured to respond. Being consistent and flexible is a great way to engage with a Virgo guy. [7] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019.
